thread.title: Malcolm Sleath
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Malcolm Sleath

author: Malcolm Sleath
title: Malcolm Sleath
text: Already knew Ecco quality from high street purchases. Purchased a similar product so was happy about size and 'feel' in advance. Impressed with delivery tracking. If anything, shoes supplied were more impressive than the website suggested. Would not hesitate to buy again.
